title: President Donald J. Trump Is Helping Americans Gain a Second Chance to Build a Brighter Future – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
June 13, 2019
Americans have always believed in the power of redemption – that those who have fallen can work toward brighter days ahead.
						President Donald J. Trump					PROVIDING A SECOND CHANCE AT SUCCESS: President Donald J. Trump is advancing second chance hiring to help give all Americans the opportunity to work towards a brighter future.  FROM THE FIRST STEP TO A SECOND CHANCE: The First Step Act and second chance hiring are part of President Trump’s agenda to create opportunity for all Americans.LIFTING UP OUR WORKERS, BUSINESSES, AND COMMUNITIES: The American people, our businesses, and our communities all benefit from second chance hiring.
